task.title: Launching Open Search Server
task.shortdesc: Start the server by executing the start batch file.

step.cmd: Start the server by executing the start batch file.

choices.choice: On Windows, run the file start.bat as a command.
On Unix/Linux/Mac OS, open a shell, and execute start.sh.

step.stepresult: The server is running, and will now start listening to the tcp port 8080.
